analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule claims to uphold merit-based hiring, but in reality, it undermines this principle by reclassifying career civil servants as at-will employees.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, the erosion of merit-based systems, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge. The emphasis on protecting the integrity of the civil service and the risks posed by the rule clearly aligns with an anti-rule stance.
